required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: The Tolerability, Pharmacokinetics and Pharmacodynamics Study of HEC110114 Tablets in HCV-infected Subjects
clinical_study.official_title: A Phase Ib/IIa, Single Center, Randomized, Open, Sofosbuvir-controlled, Multiple Ascending Dose Study to Access the Tolerability， Pharmacokinetics and Pharmacodynamics of HEC110114 Tablets in HCV-infected Subjects

brief_summary.textblock: A Phase Ib/IIa, Single Center, Randomized, open, Sofosbuvir-controlled, Multiple Ascending Dose Study to Access the Tolerability，Pharmacokinetics and Pharmacodynamics of HEC110114 Tablets in HCV-infected Subjects

detailed_description.textblock: A total of 24 evaluable patients will be enrolled in this study. The study randomly divided into three dose groups and HEC110114 tablets planned dose levels are 600, 800, and 1200 mg, sofosbuvir tablets planned dose levels are 400 mg .

secondary_outcome.description: Time to Maximum Observed Plasma Concentration
Area Under the Plasma Concentration vs Time Curve to Last Measurable Concentration

arm_group.description: Subjects receiving 600 mg HEC110114 tablet (N=6) or sofosbuvir tablets(N=2) once daily (q.d.) for 3 days
Subjects receiving 800 mg HEC110114 tablet (N=6) or sofosbuvir tablets(N=2) once daily (q.d.) for 3 days
Subjects receiving 1200 mg HEC110114 tablet (N=6) or sofosbuvir tablets(N=2) once daily (q.d.) for 3 days

overall_official.affiliation: The First Hospital of Jilin University
The First Hospital of Jilin University

facility.name: The First Hospital of Jilin University
